W

waitForTheNextRace() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Changes the Spectator's state to Waiting for a Race to Start (WFRTS) and waits till the last ControlCentre.proceedToPaddock() of the pair Horse/Jockey.
WAITING_FOR_A_RACE_TO_START - entities.SpectatorState
This is a blocking state.
WAITING_FOR_BETS - entities.BrokerState
This is a blocking state with transition.
WATCHING_A_RACE - entities.SpectatorState
This is a blocking state.
winner - Variable in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
The current winner of this race as the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which has crossed the finish line first.
winners - Variable in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Array of Spectator's identification numbers to whom the betting money should go.
winnersArrived - Variable in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Condition variable for noticing the number of winning Spectators who arrived at this Betting Centre.
winnersMustNotReceiveTheirMoney - Variable in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Condition variable for noticing when Spectators must receive their money or not, if they have won the bet.
